name: Typograzoo
description:
No animals, only letters and symbols.

Final experiment part of my research around the use of typography in game engines. In this walking simulator, the player visits a zoo, observing the action of numerous letters.

The park is separated in four sections. There’s the vowels, the symbols, the consonants and the numbers. Each subject display, in a unique manner, a living representation of typography and what it illustrates. For instance, vowels are loud and intimidating compared to consonants who stick together to form new shapes.

Read more here
